## hpr1657 :: Hacking Gutenberg eBooks

 Links to stuff I mentioned in the podcast:

Project Gutenberg: https://www.gutenberg.org/

"Washington Square" by Henry James: https://www.gutenberg.org/ebooks/2870

Calibre ebook manager: https://calibre-ebook.com/

My "basic ebook" css file: https://paste.jonkulp.net/bokehecisa.css
